patterns: What is fed
tell me about fed
responses: A group of KIIT TBI students called Federation of Entrepreneurship Development (FED) hopes to inspire those who have an entrepreneurial spirit by uniting all potential startup ideas onto a one platform. FED helps you get in touch with the greatest contacts, resources, and mentors by organising events that raise awareness of entrepreneurship.

A group of students from KIIT TBI called Federation of Entrepreneurship Development (FED) hope to inspire those who want to start their own business by assembling all potential startup ideas onto one platform. FED links you to the best tools, contacts, and mentors by organising events to raise awareness of entrepreneurship.

The Federation of Entrepreneurship Development (FED), a group of KIIT TBI students, aims to provide all possible startup ideas on one platform in order to encourage individuals who wish to launch their own company. FED hosts events that promote entrepreneurship and connects you with the best resources, contacts, and mentors.

patterns: What is fed admired for?
what is special about fed
why should i choose fed
responses: We aim to nurture entrepreneurship through creative, authentic, and efficient techniques. There is no I, only we. We exist as a team, function as a team, and execute as a team.

Our goal is to foster entrepreneurship by using methods that are original, genuine, and effective. There is just us, not an I. We are a team; we work together, play together, and accomplish as a team.
Our objective is to foster entrepreneurship by employing innovative, genuine, and effective methods. I do not exist; we do. We work together, we live together, and we act together.

patterns: what is the FEDpreneur Show
tell me about the FEDpreneur Show
what is the fed podcast
responses: The FEDpreneur Show is our podcast series in which we host India's most successful entrepreneurs and strive to uncover their secrets to success, learning, and entertainment! Every conversation on The FEDpreneur Show offers intellectual, educational, and extreme learning opportunities to the audience. It's about a visionary entrepreneur session with a group of multi-talented and experienced business owners. It would aid our young brains to stand strong in marketing and startup endeavors with our podcasts at The FEDpreneur Show, where we host India's best success stories and aim to dig out their secrets to success, learning, and enjoyment!

Our podcast series, The FEDpreneur Show, features the most prosperous businesspeople in India, and it aims to reveal their trade secrets for prosperity, education, and amusement! The audience can learn something new and profound from each and every discussion on The FEDpreneur Show. It concerns a workshop on imaginative entrepreneurship with a group of skilled and seasoned business owners. With The FEDpreneur Show, where we feature India's top success stories and try to uncover their keys to happiness, learning, and success, it would help our young minds to persevere in marketing and startup pursuits!

patterns: who all leads fed
who all is in the team leading fed
responses: We are a tight-knit community of passionate people devoted to bringing about vibrant and awe-inspiring changes in the field of Entrepreneurship. The pillars of our crew are the Marketing group, the Creative group, the Technical group, and the Operations group. Further details are on the team page of the website.

We are a close-knit group of enthusiastic individuals committed to transforming the entrepreneurial landscape into something exciting and breathtaking. The groups that make up our staff include the Marketing, Creative, Technical, and Operations departments. Additional information can be found on the website's team page.

Our network of dedicated individuals is close-knit and committed to enacting remarkable and dynamic improvements in the world of entrepreneurship. The cornerstones of our team consist of the Marketing, Creative, Technical, and Operations groups. You may find more information on the website's team page.

responses: You can contact fed at fedkiit@gmail.com or meet us in Campus 11, KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, 751024

patterns: What is fed's mission?
tell me about fed's mission
what is the mission of fed
responses: We aim to nurture entrepreneurship through creative, authentic, and efficient techniques. Being a forum for young entrepreneurs and assisting them in launching their businesses via providing useful information that indicates an organization's ability to function as a cohesive one. Organizing entrepreneurial activities to boost the confidence of aspiring entrepreneurs.

We want to promote entrepreneurship through innovative, honest, and efficient methods. Being a platform for young entrepreneurs and aiding them in starting their enterprises by offering relevant information demonstrates an organization's capacity to work cohesively. Organizing entrepreneurial events to increase the confidence of budding entrepreneurs.

patterns: what is the skillhunt about
tell me about something about the skillhunt
what is skillhunt
responses: Skill Hunt, an immersive event designed to explore the forefront of innovation across four dynamic cohorts: AI/ML, UI/UX, digital marketing, and Prompt Engineering. Whether you're a seasoned professional or a curious beginner, dive into hands-on workshops, engaging discussions, and networking opportunities tailored to each cohort's unique landscape.

Skill Hunt is an experiential event meant to explore the cutting edge of innovation in four dynamic cohorts: AI/ML, UI/UX, digital marketing, and Prompt Engineering. Whether you're a seasoned expert or a curious novice, participate in hands-on seminars, interesting conversations, and networking opportunities customized to each cohort's specific terrain.

patterns: what are the bizz battle about
tell me about the bizz battle
responses: BIZZ-BATTLE is an engaging business challenge event designed for aspiring business leaders. It consists of three rounds, each aimed at testing participant's knowledge, agility, and strategic acumen. The event begins with Round 1, a business quiz featuring questions to assess the depth of participant's knowledge. Teams that excel in this round move forward to Round 2, a thrilling treasure hunt where they must find answers to a set of riddles on campus. The most accurate teams then progress to the final round, Round 3, where they are presented with a real-world business scenario.

BIZZ-BATTLE is an exciting business challenge event for aspiring company leaders. It comprises of three rounds, each of which tests the participant's knowledge, agility, and strategic acumen. The event begins with Round 1, a business quiz with questions designed to measure participants' expertise. Teams that thrive in this round advance to Round 2, a thrilling treasure hunt where they must solve a series of puzzles throughout campus. The most accurate teams move on to the final round, Round 3, when they are presented with a real-world business issue.

patterns: what are the stonkaholic about
tell me about the stonkaholic
responses: This incredible competition allows all the participants to experience hands-on stock trading and hone their financial literacy. Trade with virtual money as you keep an eye on the market and best the competition with your wits. ANALYZE. CAPITALISE. DEVELOP

All competitors in this amazing competition get the opportunity to practice their financial literacy and gain firsthand experience in stock trading. As you watch the market and use your cunning to outsmart the competitors, you can trade with virtual money. Examine. Invest. Advance
